name: NSEPSImageRep
desc: An object that can render an image from encapsulated PostScript (EPS) code.

items.name: init?(data: Data)
items.desc: Returns a representation of an image initialized with the specified EPS data.

items.name: var boundingBox: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle that bounds the image representation.

items.name: var epsRepresentation: Data
items.desc: The EPS representation of the image representation.
